resources.string: After switching to the smooth mode, the fluency of editing large texts will be greatly enhanced, but this operation will lead to some features of the input method(such as copy and cut) being restricted. Moreover, the function of MT\'s own menu will not be affected.

This function can repair the dex file format corruption within a certain range and remove invalid data in the dex file. (for example, some encryption will add special data to the dex so that the dex file cannot be processed normally)
Please extract the file to the local directory before doing so
The signature was successfully imported and the file was saved to:\n%s

1. Copy the .jks or .keystore file used to sign the apk on computer to your phone. If you don't have this file, you can click 「GENERATE KEY」 below. 

2. Locate the file in the MT and open it, enter the password, alias, alias password (consistent with the information you entered when generating the file), and click OK. 

3. Finally, choose whether to set a password as needed. (By default, the imported signature can be used directly, no need to fill in the above information again, if you feel unsafe, you can set a password)
Do you want to enter a password when using this signature? Leave blank if you do not need it.
Incorrect password or the file is corrupt
Verificando a nova versão, por favor aguarde

Traduzido em Português do Brasil por:
• Diorgenes Setubal
• Gabriela Mardroeme

Due to system restrictions, you need to authorize the MT Manager to obtain full access to the directory. After you click OK to enter the authorization page, you can directly click the button at the bottom to complete the authorization. \n\n(If you have root privileges, you may be able to access the directory without authorization. At this time, you can turn off "Use API to access external storage" in the settings to hide the prompt.)

Search resource: @/? + resource name or hexadecimal id, such as @string/xxx, ?attr/xxx, @7f080001

Check color: # + hexadecimal color value, support four formats like #RGB, #ARGB, #RRGGBB, #AARRGGBB, such as #F00

Digital conversion: Just input the number (When the input value is a resource ID, the corresponding resource information will be additionally displayed), MT will recognize the digital format according to the following format.

Binary: Must start with 0b, followed by 0 or 1, such as 0b1101

Octal: Must start with 0, followed by 0–7, such as 0701

Decimal: Composed of 0–9, can not start with 0 unless it is negative or zero, such as 1234

Hex: Composed of 0-F, if it does not contain A-F, it must start with 0x, such as F0F0, 0x1234

Only decimal can start with a negative sign, all digital system are not case-sensitive.

Numeric parts can be added underlines or spaces for better readability, such as 0b1000_0000_1111
Floating ball stick to the edge after 3s of inactivity

This function can hook the application's PackageManager.getPackageInfo() and modify the signatures returned by it. It applies only to the application that verifies the signature in this way. 

MT gets the original signature data from the META-INF/XXX.RSA file, so make sure that the RSA signature information file in the APK being processed is unmodified.

If the current file is not the original APK, please add the META-INF/XXX.RSA (DSA) file in the original APK to the current APK.
The signature key is only used to sign the output apk.
The full path has been copied to the clipboard.
The entry with this ID already exists.
The maximum ID can only be %04X.
Play Store service is not available.
Do you want to convert "%s" to dex file?
Hex Editor is a VIP feature. You can still try out all the features, but you cannot save the changes.
We can not verify your VIP status, please make sure that the internet is connected.\nNow you can experience all the features of Hex Editor, but can not save changes.
Show \"time + size\" for file in all path.
Show \"permission + size\" for file in non-storage path.
Merge failed, too many method references in Dex. You can try to merge fewer dex files or use the Dex Redivide function of the apk to process.
Merge failed, too many field references in Dex. You can try to merge fewer dex files or use the Dex Redivide function of the apk to process.

According to Google\'s request, we upgraded MT\'s targetSDK to 26, and used a new API to send files to external APP. If these apps are not upgraded in time, the files may not be accepted normally, resulting in the inability to open files in the MT through the external APP. You can solve this problem by installing the plugin provided by MT.

{P}: Filename prefix, such as abc in abc.txt
{S}: Filename suffix, such as .txt in abc.txt
{N}: A number that increments from N, the N needs to be a specific number, such as {0}, {1}
{zN}: Similar to {N}, the difference is that it will be aligned with zeros. For example, rename {z8} will get 08, 09, 10, 11…

If you don't use the replace function, leave the text to find blank
Try to restore the encrypted strings in Dex. A number of string encryption tools are currently supported.
If the processing is successful, you can click "Details" to view the specific changes.

Can\'t find the resources.arsc file, you can copy it into the data folder of the project directory.

Some apks confuse dex with symbolic names that are difficult to distinguish with the naked eye, such as Oo0, whitespace, etc., making it difficult to code analysis. 

This function can quickly re-confuse dex, rename these special symbol names to easily identifiable names, and eliminate visual interference. 

In addition, MT will try to fix the code of Java reflection operation, but if the strings is encrypted, it may cause the repair to fail. In this case, decrypt the strings first, or use recovery mode before installing and running.

Recovery mode is the reverse operation of normal mode, this mode restores the apk processed in normal mode to its original symbolic name.

This process needs to read the mapping file, so make sure there is a mapping file in the apk.

If the apk processed in the normal mode can not be started, but you still want to modify it, you can try to use the recovery mode after the modification, and then install and run it.
Can not find the mapping file

The MT Manager account is for personal use only, and all users cannot lend the account in any public place. Once the situation is discovered, the official will have the right to freeze the account! \nIf you find that someone else is lending an account, please report it to us. After the verification, we will give the whistleblower a VIP key equivalent to the reported account, and will not disclose your identity.

If multiple dexes are generated after processing, the app will not run on systems under Android 5.0.

Note: Limit the number of methods in each dex, the maximum is 65536, the greater the limit, the fewer the number of dex generated, and the more the contrary. If there are no special requirements, it is recommended to enter 64000 to make room for subsequent dex modification.
Note: Assign the code to each dex as evenly as possible. If the number of dex is too small and the number of codes is too large, processing may fail. In this case, increase the number of dex.
Cannot generate dex, the number of methods in a single dex exceeded 65536, please try to use the \"DEX Redivide\" function to process the apk file in advance.

This function can automatically insert a log-printing instruction to the code where meets the conditions. When the APP runs to the inserted position, the context information will be output to the specified file. This function can be used for string decryption, key printing, etc.
Inject into the specified classes\nEnter the \"full class name\", such as: bin.mt.plus.Main
Inject into the specified packages (excluding sub-packages)\nEnter \"package-name.*\", such as: bin.mt.plus.*, then bin.mt.plus.Main will be injected, but bin.mt.plus.a.Main will not be injected.
Inject into the specified packages (including sub-packages)\nEnter \"package-name.**\", such as: bin.mt.plus.**, then bin.mt.plus.Main will be injected, and bin.mt.plus.a.Main will also be injected.
Exclude the specified packages or classes\nJust add ! In front of the expression, such as: !bin.mt.plus.*, !bin.mt.plus.Main
One rule per line, leave it blank if injected into all classes
Rewrite source file and line number
If the custom log file path has no write permission, the file will be saved to /data/data/[PACKAGE]/logs/[TIME].log

(If your system supports full-screen gestures and it is easy to accidentally touch the bottom gestures of the full-screen when sliding up, you can increase the bottom margin of the bottom toolbar in the MT settings)

Starting from Android 11, third-party software cannot access the xxx directory due to system restrictions. You can try to authorize to allow MT to gain access to the directory. Click [OK] to enter the authorization page, and click [USE THIS FOLDER] at the bottom to complete the authorization. (If the authorization fails, it may be the reason that the system does not support it. You can also try to grant root permissions to MT to solve it.)

This feature is only available with root privileges.
Installation timed out, no system response.
Installation timed out, please try to turn off "MIUI optimization" in developer options.
Installation failed, please try to turn off "MIUI optimization" in developer options.

You are about to install apks/xapk files in rootless mode. Due to MIUI's changes to Android API, there may be unpredictable situations that may cause the installation to fail.

If you encounter this problem, you can probably fix it by turning off MIUI optimization in the developer options.

If the problem still cannot be solved after trying, then you can only install in root mode by enabling root permissions.
